snippet.title: Warlords III Reign Of Heroes Intro
snippet.description:
Intro vid for the best turn based strategy game of the 90's. The third in the warlords series Reign of Heroes was a great step forward in AI, audio, and video quality for the genre. Credit  to Steve Fawkner, who created it; and SSG and Red Orb for development and Publishing. 
   All images & content etc. copyrighted & trademarked by their respective owners.--------------------------
 
  As far as I know I am the only person who still plays the first three tbs warlords titles,  I can't say I'm a fan of the newer RTS editions to the series they've churned out. Not that I don't like that genre, I just prefer the Warlords series as a turn based medium.
